consultarInfoTabla.sentencia: SELECT key_aliases, column_aliases FROM system.schema_columnfamilies WHERE keyspace_name = ? AND columnfamily_name = ?;

consultarValidacionesColumnas.sentencia: SELECT column_name, grupo_validacion FROM diewebsiten.columnas WHERE keyspace_name = ? AND columnfamily_name = ?;

consultarTiposColumnas.sentencia: SELECT column_name, type FROM system.schema_columns WHERE keyspace_name = ? AND columnfamily_name = ?;
